text: If order of group G is n and also given that n â‚¬ {6k - 1|k is a prime numbers and k< 9} then which of the following statement is/ are true? (a) The number generators in G, is (n - 1). (b) G is always abelian. (c) Gis cyclic. (d) If n mod p = 0 then there always exists a subgroup of G, whose order is p.
